about_the_game:
Tree it is a low poly 3d tree generator for the creation of 3d tree models for your own apps and games. Exports to .dbo .fbx (acsii) .obj .x.

Features

  • Very easy to create 3D trees models.

  • Create any tree, not limited to just one tree type.

  • Edit each joint as well as break joints to create stumps.

  • Render to image for leaf branch creation.

  • Poly reduction for LOD.

  • Texture files .dds .tga .png .bmp .jpg.

  • Exports to .dbo .fbx(ascii) .obj .x.

  • Sell your own tree models on 3rd party asset stores. **

Extra features for Tree It on steam

  • Tree node generator system, makes building trees easier.

  • Change theming such as a dark mode through visual styles.

  • Extrude quad along trunk/branch sides and segments.

Tree pack samples Included with the steam version of Tree It that you can export and use in your apps/game projects

  • Banana plants - 14 variations.

  • Cacti - variations of barrel cactus, organ pipe cactus, prickly pear and saguaro.

  • Coconut palms - 14 variations.

  • Date palms - 14 variations.

  • Desert shrubs - variations of agave, cholla, creosote, ocotillo and yacca.

  • Doum palms - 14 variations.

  • Joshua tree - 8 variations.

  • Key thatch palms- 14 variations.

  • Stylized tropical - variations of banana plant, coconut palm, monstera and grass.

  • tropical plants - variations of alocasia macrorrhiza, Anthurium, monstera deliciosa, fern and needle palm.

** I would like to confirm that if you are selling assets exported from tree it be sure that the assets and the media are your own original works or creative commons. the provide tree packs are solely as educational examples and cannot be sold as a 3rd party assets.

name: Tree It

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP/Vista/7
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz or faster
  • Memory: 1024 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Shader module 3.0 supported graphics
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 950 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7/10
  • Processor: 3.0 GHz or faster
  • Memory: 2048 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia gtx 980 or better

short_description: Tree It, a simple and easy to use 3D tree generator.
